JobTitle: Senior Interaction Designer, Experience Design Group - Remote US
JobFullDesc: User Experience (UX) Senior Designer –Remote US Everything we do, we do with our customers front of mind. As part of the Experience Design Group (EDG), you will be part that of the team leads the design and evaluation of technologies that make our innovative, game-changing products as easy to use as possible. We apply a user-centered, iterative design process to deliver usable interface designs across hardware and software products. We collect and make good use of a broad range of data and employ human factors engineering principles to identify and resolve usability problems and gain insights that influence product design and development.Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as an User Experience (UX) Senior Designer with our Experience Design Team as a Remote US team member.This Designer/Researcher defines and owns user experience design deliverables across software project initiatives including ideation, user-flow analysis, wire-framing, interaction design, prototyping, branding, content management, and execution. The individual ensures interactive designs achieve the highest level of usability, desirability, and customer satisfaction. In this role, you will be asked to carry products from concept to development using their abilities to distill complex problems into intuitive, clean, user-friendly designs leveraging their knowledge and history with user experience concepts, creating information architectures, applying and growing existing design languages and systems, while delivering the appropriate content to development partners (workflows, behavioral specifications, redlines, interactive prototypes, etc.).Take the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table.
